titleStmt.title: Light in darknesse: discovered in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons, November 24. 1647. being the day of their publick fast. / By William Carter, minister of the Gospel. Published by order from that House.
titleStmt.author: Carter, William, 1605-1658.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Simmons, for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black Spread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
